info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 2:31PM EDT until June 26 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BERKS COUNTY... At 231 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Womelsdorf, or near Myerstown, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamburg and Strausstown. This includes Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 18 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
